body:
File module

This is the local file and directory module
file
Tangler\Module\File\Module

Trigger: New file trigger

This thing monitors a directory for new files
new_file
Tangler\Module\File\NewFileTrigger
  • dir (string): Absolute path of the directory to monitor

Action: New file action

This action creates a new file in a directory
new_file
Tangler\Module\File\CreateFileAction
  • dir (string): Absolute path of the directory to put new files
  • filename (string): Absolute path of the directory to put new files
  • content (string): Absolute path of the directory to put new files
